title: Strictly fans banned from taking pics outside studios to avoid 'cheating' scandals
text:

Strictly Come Dancing producers have banned superfans from taking photos of the stars leaving the show's studios following last year's cheating scandal.

It comes after Seann Walsh and Katya Jones were pictured sharing a steamy kiss outside of the studio after the show last year.

Now fans have been warned not to use cameras at all while on the site, and have even been warned by security that any pictures taken will be deleted.

A source told The Sun: "Someone being snap-happy sparked the Seann Walsh scandal, and nobody wants that repeated. They're taking no chances."

In October last year, Seann, 32, and pro star, Katya, 29, kissed outside a London pub on a night out.

(Image: David Dyson)

(Image: Daily Record)

A witness said: "They were snogging like a pair of teenagers and didn't seem to care who might see them."

But Seann had kissed his Strictly Come Dancing partner on multiple occasions, eyewitnesses claimed.

The shamed comedian was publicly dumped on by Rebecca Humphries after pictures of him smooching Katya dropped online.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

He was slammed for his brief apology statement, in which he made no mention of his live-in girlfriend of five years, and said the kiss that was caught on camera was "a one-off drunken mistake which I am truly sorry for".

At the time, Katya - who is married to Strictly's choreographer Neil Jones - said her marriage was rock solid.

But it's since been claimed that Seann and Katya embarked on more than one game of tonsil tennis - and were actually seen drinking in a quiet central London pub every night for a week before they were caught in a passionate late-night embrace.

"Katya and Seann came in to the pub every night that week at about 9.30pm," one regular at The Duke of York pub in Marylebone told the Sun , adding that neither of them wore workout gear when they showed up.

"They looked like a normal couple - really comfortable with other and they were quite tactile with each other at bar. No one knew who they were and they really kept themselves to themselves, choosing to sit outside."

*Strictly Come Dancing returns on Saturday at 6:40pm
description: The show's producers have banned fans from taking photos on site following the Seann and Katya cheating scandal
